column4: Hello, I use Ubuntu 10.04 and I have configure a PPPOE user but after I reboot NetworkManager is not shown to show that I need to do this... > Login terminal do this <>>> cd /etc/network > rm -rf interfaces > ps x | grep Net* >> kill -9 NR | then the network manager is shown and rady to work :PP anyy one can help me to fix this problem !!!!!!!
